激活的卡片: {"cost":{"最高力量":3},"params":"$[1000, 5000]$","description":"$[formatInt(params[option ? 1 : 0])]$","formula":"$[formatInt(params[0]), formatInt(params[1])]$","disabled":"$option && store.state.currency.考试通过.value < 1$","trigger":"${ if (option) { if (store.state.currency.考试通过.value >= 1) { store.dispatch('currency/spend', { feature: '学校', name: '考试通过', amount: 1 }, { root: true }); store.dispatch('currency/gain', { feature: '学校', name: '金尘', amount: \\text{四舍五入}(SCHOOL_EXAM_DUST_MIN  \\cdot  store.getters['学校/dustMult']) }, { root: true }); store.commit('stat/add', { feature: '学校', name: 'totalPoints', value: params[1] }, { root: true }); } } else { store.commit('stat/add', { feature: '学校', name: 'totalPoints', value: params[0] }, { root: true }); } }$"}
